gw2BBCode
[gw2:th:Dagger/Dagger|shortbow] [gw2:Signet of Malice] [gw2:Roll for initiative][gw2:Caltrops][gw2:ShadowStep] [gw2:Dagger storm]
Follow @gw2BBCode.pl

[gw2:Might]
What is gw2BBCode ?

Gw2BBCode is javascript plugin, which extends capability of GW2DB Tooltip. It converts (on the fly) Guild Wars 2 skill's names (traits, condition & boons) into icons. It can also show tooltip with description over the icon.
All tooltips content comes from GW2DB.

[gw2:agony]
What's new in Gw2BBCode2 ?

  • Gw2BBCode does not require any configuration to make it work
  • Gw2BBCode database has been updated
  • New feature: Tooltip over tooltip (see: skills chain)
  • Lots of small fixes

[gw2:Aegis]
What macros are for and how to use them ?

Macros allow you to get entire set of skills. You don't need to write every single skill from the weapon set by hand. All you need to do is to define weapon of choise and profession.

[profession*:main_hand/offhand:stance**]

* just first 2 letters of profession name
** ele only (default fire)


[ne:dagger/focus][gw2:ne:dagger/focus]
[gu:mace/shield][gw2:gu:mace/shield]
[ra:longbow][gw2:ra:longbow]
[el:scepter/dagger][gw2:el:scepter/dagger]

[gw2:Stability]
Weapons set swap

[profession*:main_hand/offhand|main_hand/offhand:stance**]

* just first 2 letters of profession name
** ele only (default fire)


[ne:dagger/focus|Scepter/Warhorn][gw2:ne:dagger/focus|Scepter/Warhorn]
[gu:mace/shield|Greatsword][gw2:gu:mace/shield|Greatsword]
[ra:longbow|shortbow][gw2:ra:longbow|shortbow]
[el:scepter/dagger|staff:water][gw2:el:scepter/dagger|staff:water]

[gw2:Swiftness]
gw2BBCode vs GW2DB Tooltip - differences

  • All you need to know is the skill name, not the entire link adress.
  • Gw2BBCode shows icons wheres GW2DB Tooltip shows only links.
  • Gw2BBCode has macros - GW2DB Tooltip don't.
  • Gw2BBCode caches loaded recources - GW2DB Tooltip don't.
  • Both plugins can show tooltips... but gw2BBCode do it better ;)
  • Gw2BBCode is compatible with GW2DB Tooltip notation (tooltip over link)

[gw2:Vigor]
Instalation

If your page already use JQuery just copy-paste this code snippet into your website

<script type="text/javascript"
src="http://gw2bbcode.pl/gw2BBCode.js"></script>

otherwise you need to add JQuery first:

<script type="text/javascript"
src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.0/jquery.min.js"></script>

[gw2:Poison]
Configuration

New version of Gw2BBCode does not require any configuration ;)

Basics:

Just put name of the skill into a brackets and... that's it!

[gw2:Become the Raven][gw2:Become the Raven]

Make sure to write correct name - include every " ! ' -

[gw2:"On My Mark!"][gw2:"On My Mark!"]

You can get skill name instead of icon by using @

[@gw2:"On My Mark!"][@gw2:"On My Mark!"]

Macros:

[gw2:el:staff:water]

[gw2:el:staff:water]

Boons & conditions

[gw2:Cripple][gw2:Poison][gw2:Burning][gw2:Aegis][gw2:Fury]...
[gw2:Cripple][gw2:Poison][gw2:Burning][gw2:Aegis][gw2:Fury][gw2:Might][gw2:Protection][gw2:Retaliation]

Traits

[gw2:Reckless Dodge][gw2:Signet Use][gw2:Terror]...
[gw2:Reckless Dodge][gw2:Signet Use][gw2:Terror][gw2:Thrill of the Crime][gw2:Transmute]

Filters: force type

[gw2:skill:regeneration] [gw2:boon:regeneration]
[gw2:skill:regeneration] [gw2:boon:regeneration]
[gw2:condition:poison] [gw2:trait:Explosive Powder]
[gw2:condition:poison] [gw2:trait:Explosive Powder]

Skills with the same names

[gw2:Disabling Shot.1] [gw2:Disabling Shot.2]
[gw2:skill:Disabling Shot.1] [gw2:skill:Disabling Shot.2]

Compatibility mode (gw1BBCode)

You can prefixed everything with:[gw2:]


GW2DB Tooltip notation:

Carrion Ring
Precise WvW Infusion[s]
Bowl[s] of Mango Pie Filling

Check it out:
